gameDesign.description: A first-person shooter where players navigate a derelict space station, battling grotesque alien parasites and solving environmental puzzles to escape before succumbing to the infestation.

setting.description: The game is set on the 'Ozymandias', a massive research and mining space station orbiting a gas giant. Abandoned decades ago after a catastrophic biological outbreak, it's now infested with alien parasites and shrouded in a chilling silence, broken only by the scuttling of creatures and the creaks of decaying metal.

characters.description: A lone salvage crew member, separated from their team during a reconnaissance mission. They are equipped with basic survival gear and must scavenge for resources and weapons to survive.

Various forms of alien parasites, ranging from small, fast-moving 'Crawlers' to large, heavily armored 'Brutes' and parasitic 'Infectors' capable of turning former crew members into monstrous hybrids.
Echoes - Holographic recordings of the station's former crew members, providing clues and backstory about the outbreak. These cannot be interacted with directly, but serve as a narrative device.

mechanics: Resource Management: Scavenging for ammunition, health packs, and upgrade components is crucial for survival.
Environmental Puzzles: Solving logic puzzles and manipulating the station's systems (power grids, ventilation, etc.) to progress and gain advantages.
Strategic Combat: Utilizing different weapon types and exploiting enemy weaknesses to overcome challenging encounters.

levels.name: Arrival Bay
levels.description: The starting area. A damaged landing bay with debris and signs of a desperate struggle. Introduces basic movement, combat, and puzzle mechanics.

levels.name: Research Labs
levels.description: A series of interconnected laboratories where the parasites were initially studied. Contains more complex puzzles and introduces new enemy types.

levels.name: Engineering Core
levels.description: The heart of the station's power and life support systems. A large, interconnected area with dangerous environmental hazards and a final confrontation.

environment: Gooey alien nests and organic growths
audio: Ambient space station sounds (creaking metal, dripping water)
